actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for an offer to transfer to the Secretary of the Army of certain property at the Navy Annex, Arlington, Virginia.
short_title: Arlington National Cemetery Enhancement Act of 1996

summary.text: Arlington National Cemetery Enhancement Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of Defense, upon determining that the Department no longer requires the Navy Annex Federal Building Number 2 in Arlington, Virginia, to offer to transfer to the Secretary of the Army administrative jurisdiction over such property to be utilized as part of the Arlington National Cemetery, Virginia.

titles.title: Arlington National Cemetery Enhancement Act of 1996
A bill to provide for an offer to transfer to the Secretary of the Army of certain property at the Navy Annex, Arlington, Virginia.
